references.paper_title: Multi-realism image compression with a conditional generator
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it proposes a method for multi-realism image compression, addressing a similar goal of the current paper, and directly comparing with the same baseline methods.

references.paper_title: End-to-end optimized image compression for machines, a study
references.reason: This paper explores end-to-end optimized image compression for machine vision tasks, directly addressing the problem of multi-task coding for joint human-machine vision which is the focus of the current paper.

This paper is highly relevant because it focuses on high-fidelity image compression and uses GAN-based methods, which the current paper also uses for improving perceptual quality and directly comparing with the same baseline methods.

references.paper_title: Learned image compression with mixed transformer-cnn architectures
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it proposes a learned image compression method with mixed transformer-CNN architectures, addressing a similar problem to the current paper and comparing with the same baseline methods.

references.paper_title: High-efficiency lossy image coding through adaptive neighborhood information aggregation
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it proposes a high-efficiency lossy image coding method and directly comparing with the same baseline methods, which provides the foundation for the current paper's approach.
